ID: CKTN7WW_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-07 13:37
Subject: Get ready to show us your Summer Office,Take One Chalhoub Everywhere, Building Bridges across Asia, Tory Burch and Michael Kors Sale, Jil Sander Sale
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1450&user=10620> 	

Whether you’re working with a view of the beach, a cozy café, or your beautiful backyard, share your summer office with us by: 

*	Posting a photo or video of your summer office setup / setting / view on One Chalhoub
*	Sharing a photo or video of your summer office on your Instagram Stories and tag @ChalhoubGroup <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1451&user=10620>  (TikTok reels and fun videos are highly welcomed!)

chunks.text:
*	Posting a photo or video of your summer office setup / setting / view on One Chalhoub
*	Sharing a photo or video of your summer office on your Instagram Stories and tag @ChalhoubGroup <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1451&user=10620>  (TikTok reels and fun videos are highly welcomed!)

Send your high-resolution photos and videos to Nadiem Karas <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1452&user=10620>  or Nina Samin <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1453&user=10620>  to be part of our Instagram recap post and be featured on our TikTok channel <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1454&user=10620>  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1454&user=10620> at the end of summer. 

Let’s celebrate the flexibility of remote working <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1450&user=10620>  this summer! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Take One Chalhoub Everywhere










Unlock One Chalhoub on the go! 
Add it to your home page today and stay just one tap away from everything that matters!

Check out how to add One Chalhoub <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1455&user=10620>  to your phone home page.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1455&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Building Bridges Across Asia

Check out how to add One Chalhoub <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1455&user=10620>  to your phone home page.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1455&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Building Bridges Across Asia

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1456&user=10620> 	

In line with our Group Strategy & Business Development efforts, our Country Management team recently paid introductory visits to the Consulates of China and Korea in Dubai.

Aligned with Vision 2033 and our Asian Beauty ambition, we explored opportunities for bilateral cooperation in business and cultural exchange. We look forward to building strong partnerships to support mutual growth across Asian markets. 
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1456&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png> 	

Tory Burch & Michael Kors Exclusive Sale

Enjoy a flat 50% off on sale items – exclusively for Chalhoub Group team members!

Available in stores across all regions until August 3rd.

To redeem, simply present your Chalhoub Group ID or show your One Chalhoub profile at checkout.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/b65263262cc42a5955cb0958eb8bb8881959197232.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Jil Sander – Friends and Family Sale

Jil Sander – Friends and Family Sale

Starting today, Chalhoub Group team members can enjoy an additional 20% off on already discounted selected lines at the Jil Sander boutique, Mall of the Emirates.

This offer is available exclusively during the Dubai Summer Sale. Chalhoub Group ID or One Chalhoub profile will be required at the checkout. Shop in-store now  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1457&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1457&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1458&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved. 

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
